attributes.action: Stop ear piercing for babies and very small children.
attributes.additional_details:
Ear piercing for babies and very small children is non consenting.
They are not old enough to ask for this to be done. 
Small children who do ask are not mature enough to understand the procedure of piercing or a life long effect a body piercing has.
I witnessed a 4 month baby having her ears pierced in the fashion shop “claire’s” 
This baby was crying, clearly uncomfortable and anxious it was extremely upsetting to witness.

I am calling for the government to change this to make it unlawful.
attributes.background:
Make it unlawful for babies and very small children to have pierced ears 
Stop jewellers and other shops carrying out the piercing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583227
